body:
Apparently sitting in a lawn chair on the side of the road eating ice cream and listening to dubstep is "dangerous" and "bad" come on man, I was just having some fun :P
(Yes, this actually happened around 10 minutes ago)
An all black Sudan drives by me and turns around... Turns on his lights and pulls in next to me and says:

Cop: Whatcha doing?
Me: Hanging out...
Cop: You're too close to the road.
Me: I'm in my driveway next to the road... (Dubstep still playing)
Cop: Well move in closer.
Me: Uh, okay sorry. 
Cop: Have a nice day.
Me: Yeah... Thanks you too. ._.

I ended up dropping my damn ice cream, too. Seriously?

Thats my afternoon as soon as I got home from school.

title: My afternoon right after school.
